data.name: RPGScenery - Medieval Street
data.detailed_description:
This medieval town was built on top of a prominent rock on the ocean shore, built from stones and pine trees in the area. Its streets are narrow and zigzagged, interrupted here and there by smaller and larger spaces. The city lies on a hillside, so the roads are sloping, and the sight of the stairs are not rare. A clock tower rises in the middle of the city, serving as an excellent guide for travelers lost in the streets.

This DLC contains 8 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
